name: Snow White
description: Snow White is a kind and gentle princess

name: Mickey Mouse
description: Mickey Mouse is one of the most iconic and beloved cartoon characters created by Walt Disney.

name: Princess Jasmine
description: Princess Jasmine is a strong-willed and independent young woman.

name: Cinderella
description: Cinderella is a kind and gentle young woman.

description: Tiana is a hardworking and ambitious young woman.

name: Aurora

name: Winnie the Pooh
description: Winnie the Pooh, often referred to as Pooh Bear, is a lovable and friendly bear who lives in wood.

name: Moana
description: Moana is a brave and adventurous teenager from the island of Motunui.
